avalancheActivity.highlights: The snow has  melted considerably in warm weather and rain earlier this week. Some new snow is forecast in the mountains in generally calm winds.

snowpackStructure.highlights: The snow has  melted considerably in warm weather and rain earlier this week. Some new snow is forecast in the mountains. The underlying snowpack is generally considered stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface
travelAdvisory.highlights: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface

avalancheActivity.comment: Sluffs fell on Súðavíkuhlíð and Bolungarvík on 4 and 5 February.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New unstable wind slabs have formed in snowfall and snowdrift especially in N to NE slopes.  Wet avalanches will become more likely in thaw and rain on Sunday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snowfall and snowdrift may have formed new unstable wind slabs on top of the stable snow especially in N-NE slopes. Wet avalanches will become more likely in thaw and rain on Sunday.

travelAdvisory.comment: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface
travelAdvisory.highlights: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface

weatherForecast.highlights: Breytilegur vindur með éljagangi á föstudagsmorgun en bætir í síðdegis. Hægviðri, kalt og lítilsháttar snjókoma á laugardag. S-átt, hlýtt og úrkoma á sunnudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Thin wind slabs might form in light snow showers in SW-winds on top of wet snow

snowpackStructure.highlights: The melt-freeze cycles last week have made the snow generally isothermal and stable. Snow showers in SW-winds the next days will build thin slabs and the temp. gradient will cause faciting and a weak layer at the surface of the old snow

travelAdvisory.comment: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface
travelAdvisory.highlights: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface

avalancheActivity.comment: Some snowfall in moderate NE-winds on Friday and again on Saturday with SW-winds inbetween. Easy weather and almost dry on Sunday
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snowfall in easy NE-winds on Friday and again on Saturday

snowpackStructure.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted due to warm temperatures and rain on Friday and Saturday and again on Sunday-Monday. After strong melting the snow pack is expected to be isothermal and stable. The thawing next days might make it less stable again

travelAdvisory.comment: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface
travelAdvisory.highlights: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface

weatherForecast.highlights: S-stormur með hlýindum en fremur lítilli úrkomu. Hægari og kaldari á fös. með samfelldri úrkomu, bloti í byggð en snjór til fjalla
